plot: A down-on-his-luck homeless man sits with his old, worn boot, busking day and night. One day, a passing stranger gives him a generous gift, leaving the busker to question his priorities in life.
title: A Matter of Priority
plot_es: A down-on-his-luck homeless man sits with his old, worn boot, busking day and night. One day, a passing stranger gives him a generous gift, leaving the busker to question his priorities in life.
plot_en: A down-on-his-luck homeless man sits with his old, worn boot, busking day and night. One day, a passing stranger gives him a generous gift, leaving the busker to question his priorities in life.
